name: export-service
description: Export service to clusters specified by topology.

parameters.usage: Specify the name of the export destination
parameters.name: name

parameters.usage: Specify the namespace of the export destination
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.usage: Specify the ip to be export
parameters.name: ip

parameters.usage: Specify the port to be used in service
parameters.name: port

parameters.usage: Specify the port to be export
parameters.name: targetPort
